CustomField.description: To identify if there was at least one meeting held with Inv. team
CustomField.formula: if(and ( RecordType.Name ="PFG", or( NOT(ISBLANK( Date_of_Last_Meeting_with_Investment_Tea__c )), (PFG_Number_of_Meetings__c)>0, Contains(text(StageName),"3"), Contains(text(StageName),"4"), Contains(text(StageName),"5"), Contains(text(StageName),"6"), Contains(text(StageName),"7"), Contains(text(StageName),"8"), Contains(text( Previous_Stage_before_close__c),"3"), Contains(text( Previous_Stage_before_close__c),"4"), Contains(text( Previous_Stage_before_close__c),"5"), Contains(text( Previous_Stage_before_close__c),"6"), Contains(text( Previous_Stage_before_close__c),"7"))),1,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To identify if there was at least one meeting held with Inv. team
CustomField.label: PFG Prospect Met with Inv. team
